trans-unit.source: Validates that an object is a derived class of a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 验证一个对象是否是指定类型的派生类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator> class is used to ensure that an object meets specific criteria.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator>类用于确保对象满足特定条件。

trans-unit.source: The criteria for validation is established when an instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator> class is created.
trans-unit.target: 实例时，验证条件建立<xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator>创建类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.CanValidate%2A> method determines whether the type of the object being validated is in fact a <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.CanValidate%2A>方法确定是否正被验证的对象的类型实际上为<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 正在验证该对象被传递的参数<xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method first verifies that the object to validate is not `null`, and then verifies that the object is a derived class of the expected type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法首先验证要验证的对象不是`null`，，然后验证该对象是预期类型的派生的类。

trans-unit.source: The base class to validate against.
trans-unit.target: 作为验证依据的基类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The criteria for validation is based on the `baseClass` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 验证条件取决于`baseClass`参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="baseClass" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="baseClass" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object type.
trans-unit.target: 对象类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object can be validated based on type.
trans-unit.target: 根据类型确定对象是否可验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="type" /> parameter matches a type that can be validated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="type" /> 参数与可验证类型匹配，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.CanValidate%2A> method determines whether the type of the object being validated is in fact a <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.CanValidate%2A>方法确定是否正被验证的对象的类型实际上为<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: The object value.
trans-unit.target: 对象值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of an object is valid.
trans-unit.target: 确定对象的值是否有效。

trans-unit.source: When an instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator> class is created, the base class is provided and used as evaluation criteria.
trans-unit.target: 实例时<xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator>创建类，提供基类和将其用作评估条件。

trans-unit.source: The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the <xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的对象作为参数传递<xref:System.Configuration.SubclassTypeValidator.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method performs the validation check between the base class and the parameter object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的基类与参数对象之间的验证检查。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not of a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that can be derived from <paramref name="baseClass" /> as defined in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不属于可以从构造函数中定义的 <paramref name="baseClass" /> 中派生的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。
